info.additionalInfo: Version 1.1 Change Log: 10/06/2016 // Created. 11/02/2017 // Minor fixes. 21/06/2017 // Tidied up coding. 26/07/2017 // Tidied up coding, moved image hosting to Imgur, fixed bug that caused search results not to show and updated credit to new username.
